intro: As a student of philosophy and literature, I enjoy thinking and writing about different ways in which art, technology and life intertwine.

items.title: The Fancy of the Contemplatives
items.subtitle: Art and the Absurd
items.description: An essay on art as a way of life and life as raw materials of art

items.title: The Trouble with Perfection
items.subtitle: Kitsch and its Vicissitudes
items.description: A philosophical look at 'kitsch' - what it is and what is wrong with it
